#label_about_the_series

AMC's FEAR THE WALKING DEAD, the companion series to THE WALKING DEAD, is set in Los Angeles at the beginning of the zombie apocalypse. It takes us back to a time when the world was changing rapidly for reasons unknown, when life as everyone knew it was upended and altered in ways no one could have ever imagined.
